name: n8nTrigger
description: Handle events and perform actions on your n8n instance

properties.name: events
properties.description:
Specifies under which conditions an execution should happen:
  • Active Workflow Updated: Triggers when this workflow is updated
  • Instance Started: Triggers when this n8n instance is started or re-started
  • Workflow Activated: Triggers when this workflow is activated

options.name: Active Workflow Updated
options.description: Triggers when this workflow is updated

options.name: Instance Started
options.description: Triggers when this n8n instance is started or re-started

options.name: Workflow Activated
options.description: Triggers when this workflow is activated
